resources.string: 03 Pair of Linear Equations in Two Variables
Are you sure you want to leave? Press the Back button again to exit.
Yomplex JEE Calculus provides carefully designed content from expert educators to help you revise, practice & ace the JEE!
Short quizzes on each topic help you master important concepts from the JEE syllabus. Questions are frequently updated.
Short tests based on the JEE syllabus & past papers help you master time-management & accuracy. Detailed solutions are provided.

Tiny Textbooks, specially designed by experts, contain reference formulas, difficult concepts, etc. More books are being added based on student and teacher suggestions. Save offline and study when you want.

Got 12 minutes? Take a Tiny Test! Each Test contains questions based on the JEE syllabus & past papers. help you learn with concentration and make no mistakes! This helps you get in the right mindset for exams where each little mistake is expensive!
Work regularly! Try to solve at least one Test per Topic every week.
Go through the Hints in the Test Reviews. Make sure you understand each concept well!
Dont worry if you don\'t perfect scores at first. Regular practice will improve your performance.
Algebra: logic, sets, relations, complex numbers, quadratic equations, matrix, determinant.
Geometry: analytic geometry in 2 & 3 dimensions, vectors.
Calculus 1: functions, trigonometric functions, limits, continuity, derivatives.
Others: binomial theorem, sequences & series, permutations, combinations, probability, statistics.
